TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItem extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 提供工具箱项的基实现。

span.span: Provides a base implementation of a toolbox item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以在设计时环境的工具箱中显示的工具箱项的基类。 is a base class for toolbox items that can be displayed in the toolbox of a design-time environment. 工具箱项通常表示在设计模式文档上调用时要创建的组件。A toolbox item typically represents a component to create when invoked on a design mode document. 类提供方法和工具箱提供要创建的组件或组件使用时，要序列化和反本身实现持久性; 在工具箱中序列化的工具箱项的显示属性所需属性数据库。The class provides the methods and properties needed to provide the toolbox with the display properties for the toolbox item, to create a component or components when used, and to serialize and deserialize itself for persistence within the toolbox database. 实例没有创建类的派生类可以配置使用名称、 位图和要创建类型， 。An instance of the class can be configured with a name, bitmap, and type to create, without creating a class that derives from . 类还提供一个基类的自定义工具箱项的实现。The class also provides a base class for custom toolbox item implementations. 自定义可以创建多个组件。A custom can create multiple components. 若要实现自定义工具箱项，必须派生自并重写， ，和方法。To implement a custom toolbox item, you must derive from and override the , , and methods. 必须为配置了以下属性和方法才能正常工作：The following properties and methods must be configured for a to function correctly: - 属性指定的工具箱项时显示在工具箱中的标签。The property specifies the label for the toolbox item when displayed in a toolbox. - 属性指定的项创建的组件类型的完全限定的名称。The property specifies the fully qualified name of the type of the component that the item creates. 如果派生的类创建多个组件属性，也不能使用，取决于是否方法重写依赖于此属性的值。If a derived class creates multiple components, the property may or may not be used, contingent on whether a method override depends on the value of this property. - 属性指定包含的项创建的组件类型的程序集。The property specifies the assembly that contains the type of a component that the item creates. - 属性 （可选） 指定工具箱中的工具箱项的显示名称旁边显示的位图图像。The property optionally specifies a bitmap image to display next to the display name for the toolbox item in the toolbox. - 属性 （可选） 包含任何确定工具箱项是否可用于特定组件的对象。The property optionally contains any objects that determine whether the toolbox item can be used on a particular component. - 方法将返回组件实例或实例将使用此工具。The method returns the component instance or instances to insert where this tool is used. - 方法将工具箱项保存到指定。The method saves the toolbox item to a specified . - 方法将配置包含在指定的状态信息中的工具箱项。The method configures the toolbox item from the state information contained in the specified . - 方法来配置工具箱项创建指定的类型的组件，如果方法没有覆盖不同的行为。The method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type of component, if the method has not been overridden to behave differently. - 属性指示是否可以更改工具箱项的属性。The property indicates whether the properties of the toolbox item can be changed. 工具箱项通常被锁定后将其添加到工具箱。A toolbox item is typically locked after it is added to a toolbox. - 方法将锁定工具箱项。The method locks a toolbox item. - 方法将引发异常，如果属性是`true`。The method throws an exception if the property is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了使用的组件接口添加文本数据格式处理程序，或，到工具箱。The following code example provides a component that uses the interface to add a text data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 粘贴到工具箱的数据和到自定义拖动到窗体上任何文本数据的数据创建者回调委托传递，创建包含的文本。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将类作为基类的自定义工具箱项实现的类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class as a base class for a custom toolbox item implementation. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或者设置程序集的名称，该程序集中包含工具箱项创建的一个或多个类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the type or types that the toolbox item creates.

value.span: ，它指示包含将创建的一个或多个类型的程序集。

span.span: An that indicates the assembly containing the type or types to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定包含要创建的组件的类型的程序集。The property specifies the assembly that contains the types of the components to create.

span.para: 如果派生的工具箱项类创建位于不同的程序集的多个组件，则必须确保你的项目中存在的对这些程序集的引用。建议将这些引用添加的重载从方法。即使你方法不依赖于的值属性，应确保，此属性设置为要创建的组件之一所属的程序集中，因为它会显示在**自定义工具箱** Visual Studio 中的对话框。

If your derived toolbox item class creates multiple components that are located in different assemblies, you must ensure that references to these assemblies exist in your project. It is advisable to add these references from an overload of the method. Even if your method does not depend on the value of the property, you should ensure that this property is set to the assembly that one of the components to create belongs to, because it is displayed in the **Customize Toolbox** dialog box in Visual Studio.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ComponentsCreated As ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler

summary.span: 组件创建后立即发生。

span.span: Occurs immediately after components are created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工具箱项的组件创建每次都会引发事件。The event is raised each time components of this toolbox item are created. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnComponentsCreated(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs args) cil managed

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 在调用工具箱项创建组件之后调用此方法和方法已返回。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components and the method has returned. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnComponentsCreating(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnComponentsCreating (args As ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs)

abstract member OnComponentsCreating : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs -> unit override this.OnComponentsCreating : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 此方法后调用工具箱项之前创建的组件，称为调用方法。This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components, just before the method is called. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
